games.title: Age of Tanks Warriors: TD War
games.description:
Lead Your Tank Warriors to Glory Across Time!
Welcome to Age of Tank Warriors: TD War, the ultimate tank warriors strategy game! Travel through the ages of war, leading your tank army from Stone Age warriors to the sci-fi space future. Upgrade your battle tanks, engage in intense Clash of Tank Warriors battles, and use tower defense (TD) strategy to conquer every era. 100vs100 survival battles await‚Äîwill you rewrite history and become the greatest tank warlord?
games.howToPlayText:
Age of Tanks Warriors is a one-click battle game, so the actual combat portion of the game is fairly simple. The difficulty lies in the strategy of how you use your army and weapons to kill off your opponents before they kill you and destroy your fortress. Once you do this, you get to upgrade your army and weapons for an even more effective strategy.

The game begins with your stone cave, which is directly opposite your opponent's cave. You can deploy your soldiers by clicking the small icon on the bottom right of your screen. The only hitch is that you may not have enough soldiers to send out in time to match your opponent's troop!

Your task on each level is to defeat the opposing army and destroy their shelter. As the levels advance, so do the fortresses, making it even more difficult throughout the ages. Fighting begins with sticks and stones but eventually turns into tanks and artillery.

games.howToPlayText:
Chess Online Multiplayer follows the classic rules of chess. The goal of the game is to checkmate your opponent‚Äôs king, putting it in a position where it is under threat of capture and has no legal moves to escape.

**Getting Started**

1. **Choose the game type:**
* play online against other players;
* challenge the computer;
* play together on the same screen with a friend.

2. **If you‚Äôre playing against the computer:**
* select the opponent‚Äôs difficulty level (from Beginner to World Champion);
* choose whether to use a handicap and interactive hints.

3. **If you‚Äôre playing with a friend:**
* decide on the time control mode (Unlimited, Bullet, Blitz, Rapid, Classic).
* choose your bet

**Basic Rules and Gameplay**

* Players take turns making moves.
* Pawns move forward and capture diagonally.
* Knights move in an ¬´L¬ª shape.
* Other pieces have their own unique moves.

To succeed, develop a strategy: protect your pieces, control the center of the board, and anticipate your opponent‚Äôs moves.

The game ends when one player checkmates the opponent‚Äôs king (winning the game) or when a draw is achieved under certain conditions.

**Draw Conditions**
A draw is a result where neither player wins, and the game ends in a tie. It can occur under the following circumstances:
* **stalemate:** when a player has no legal moves but is not in check;
* **three-fold repetition of the position:** when the same position occurs three times;
* **50 moves without a capture or pawn move;**
* **insufficient material to checkmate;**
* mutual agreement between players.

**Special Chess Moves**

**Castling**
Castling is a special move involving the king and a rook. It can be performed only if:
* neither the king nor the rook has moved yet;
* there are no other pieces between the king and the rook;
* the king is not in check;
* the king does not pass through or stop on squares that are under attack.

This move helps to protect the king and connect the rooks for better defense.

**En Passant (Taking on Pass)**
En passant is a special pawn capture. If your opponent moves a pawn two squares forward and lands next to your pawn, you can capture it on your next move as if it had moved only one square. Your pawn will take its place, but this capture must be done immediately.

**Additional Features**

* **Made a mistake?** Use the move undo function to reconsider your strategy.
* After each match, a detailed analysis highlights mistakes and suggests better moves.
* You can replay specific moments to strengthen your understanding of the game.
* Save your rating and choose different time modes (Bullet, Blitz, Rapid).
* Customize the board and pieces to your liking.
* Review the move history and express your emotions by communicating with your opponent using playful cartoon emojis.

games.title: English Checkers Online Multiplayer
games.howToPlayText:
**How to Play English Checkers**

English Checkers is a strategic board game where players aim to capture their opponent‚Äôs checkers or block them completely. Here‚Äôs how to get started and understand the basic rules:

**Game Objective**
The goal is to either capture all of your opponent‚Äôs checkers or completely block them so they can‚Äôt make any legal moves.

**Types of Checkers**
- **Simple checker:** moves diagonally forward one square and can only capture forward.
- **King:** can move diagonally both forward and backward on any free square and can capture in both directions. When a simple checker reaches the last row, it becomes a king and gains these additional abilities.

**Basic Movement and Capture Rules**
1. **Movement:**
- simple checkers move diagonally forward one square at a time;
- kings can move diagonally in any direction on any free square.

2. **Capture:**
- if your checker is next to your opponent‚Äôs checker and there‚Äôs an empty square behind it, you must jump over the opponent‚Äôs checker and land in the empty square, capturing the opponent‚Äôs piece;
- captures are mandatory ‚Äî if you have the option to capture, you must do so;
- if a capture leads to another possible capture, you must continue capturing as part of the same turn until no more captures are possible;
- when a simple checker reaches the last row during a capture, it becomes a king but cannot make further moves in the same turn.

3. **Choosing Capture Options:**
- if there are multiple capture options available, you can choose which one to make;
- the ¬´Turkish strike¬ª rule means that a checker that has been beaten but not yet removed from the board can block the path of a king or another checker.

**Winning the Game**
You win the game by:
- capturing all of your opponent‚Äôs checkers;
- blocking your opponent so that they have no legal moves left.

**Getting Started in English Checkers Online Multiplayer**
1. **Choose your game mode:** play against the computer, compete online with real players, or play with a friend on the same screen.
2. **Select your difficulty level or opponent:** if playing against the computer, choose from 10 difficulty levels; if playing online, find a real opponent.
3. **Choose your side:** select whether you want to play as black or white.
4. **Start playing:** follow the rules of movement and capture to outmanoeuvre your opponent and achieve victory.

Enjoy the game and sharpen your strategic skills with English Checkers Online Multiplayer!

games.title: Card Quest: 10 Minute Adventure
games.description: Dudes, this is a very short strategic card battle game that blends tactical gameplay with quirky humor and vibrant creativity. Build powerful armies, summon creatures, cast spells, and construct buildings across unique terrains in epic turn-based battles. What sets this game apart is its dynamic terrain system‚Äîeach battlefield zone corresponds to specific card types, favoring attackers, healers, defenders, or versatile "special units" that can be placed anywhere! With customizable decks and deep strategic options, players must outwit their opponents to claim victory. Unlock new cards, upgrade your favorites heroes, and dominate the battlefield in this thrilling clash of wits and strategy. Let's go. In and out. After all, this is Card Quest: 10 Minute Adventure!
games.howToPlayText:
‚Ä¢ Deck Building: Before starting a match, create your deck using cards you‚Äôve collected. Customize your deck based on strategy‚Äîfocus on attack-heavy units, healing abilities, or powerful spells. 
‚Ä¢ Terrain Zones: At the start of the game, choose which terrains to place on your side of the board. Each terrain type allows only certain creatures to be summoned there, except Rainbow Creatures, which are flexible. Terrain types:
- Cornfields: Strong attackers.
- Sandlands: Defensive powerhouses.
- Blue Plains: Balanced but unpredictable.
- Candy Kingdom: Weak but great at healing allies.
- Useless Swamp: Special ability users or direct-damage dealers.
‚Ä¢ Turn-Based Mechanics: On your turn, draw cards, spend resources (Magic Points), and deploy creatures, buildings, or spells onto the field. Attack enemy creatures or target their towers directly when possible. 
‚Ä¢ Winning Conditions: Outlast your opponent by maintaining stronger forces, controlling key areas, and dealing consistent damage.

games.description:
Craftsman Land ‚Äì build your own farm and help the town recover!

Craftsman Land is a farming and crafting game where your goal is to rebuild the inherited land, expand your farm, and support the local community.

After a devastating flood, the town is in ruins. As the heir to the land, it‚Äôs up to you to restore your farm, help the townsfolk, and bring life back to the surrounding villages. Grow crops like corn and onions, go fishing, and construct new buildings such as a house, chicken coop, and cowshed. Inside your home, you can decorate and design the interior to your liking.

With just a click, you can trigger different activities such as building houses, crafting tools, or producing goods.

Complete quests given by townsfolk to earn rewards and progress in the story. When you run out of quests, head to the crossroads where the bulletin board offers an endless supply of new tasks.

Explore the map to visit different shops:

Building materials store ‚Äì get everything you need for construction.

Tool shop ‚Äì find useful equipment for your farm.

Gardening store ‚Äì buy seeds and expand your fields.

Not everything has to be bought! Many materials can be produced by yourself. Chop wood, fire clay into bricks at the campfire, and create other essential resources to use in crafting and construction.

Grow crops, raise animals, trade, and craft your way to success while helping the entire town thrive!

In this exciting puzzle platformer players embark on an amazing journey with Alice, a brave and curious explorer who finds herself stranded on a mysterious planet filled with secrets.  Each solution and obstacle overcome not only propels the player forward, but also reveals new chapters of Alice's adventure. The game's graphics are designed in a vibrant and colorful style, and the musical accompaniment creates an atmosphere of magic and mystery, immersing the player in an exciting world full of wonders and surprises.
games.howToPlayText:
On a computer:
To make the character run to the right, press the D button (or the right arrow) on the keyboard.
To make the character run to the left, press the A button (or the left arrow).
To jump, press the space bar (or the up arrow).

On a smartphone or tablet:
To make the character run to the right, tap the right arrow at the bottom of the screen.
To make the character run to the left, tap the left arrow.

Each level is designed to get a little harder, so you‚Äôll need to aim carefully, control your shot power, and plan the best path to sink the ball. It‚Äôs a relaxing yet addictive golf experience made for quick play sessions.
games.howToPlayText:
Drag/swipe in the direction you want the ball to move.
Pull back and release to adjust the strength of your shot.
The longer you drag, the stronger the hit.
Try to sink the ball into the hole in the fewest strokes possible.
Watch out for walls, ramps, and barriers that can deflect your ball.
Use angles to bounce around corners smartly.

Fire Power:
This bonus gives your ball a flaming speed boost.
It‚Äôs useful for long straight shots or when you want to quickly cross a large gap.
Best used when you need maximum distance in a single strike.

Wing / Glide Power:
This bonus allows your ball to glide smoothly as if it has wings.
It reduces friction and gives your ball a longer travel path with better control.
Ideal for precision shots where you want distance but also don‚Äôt want to overshoot too wildly.

Spring / Bounce Power:
This bonus acts like a spring-loaded push.
It helps your ball bounce forward with extra force, perfect for overcoming obstacles or making tricky jumps.
Best for courses with barriers, ramps, or platforms where normal shots can‚Äôt reach.

games.title: Bubble Tower
games.description:
Bubble Tower 3D is a relaxing 3D bubble-pop / color-match puzzle game.
You rotate a tower (or cylinder) loaded with colored bubbles around its vertical axis.
Your goal is to shoot bubbles, matching colors to connect groups of the same color. When matched, those bubbles pop/drop off the tower.
There are many levels; difficulty increases as you go. More bubble colors, trickier arrangements, limited shots, etc.
Also there are diamonds or special gems you can collect in certain levels. These may unlock ‚Äúshiny shapes‚Äù or cosmetic things.
The graphics are clean, simple, and meant for relaxing casual play. It mixes mental challenge (where to shoot, color matching) with a soothing visual.
games.howToPlayText:
A tower appears with a cluster of bubbles of various colors. There‚Äôs a shooter that holds the next bubble to fire.
You can rotate the tower around (usually by dragging left/right or using onscreen controls) to bring bubbles of matching color in position.
Tap or drag to aim, then let go (or tap a location) to shoot the bubble toward the tower. Match it with other bubbles of the same color.
When you connect 3 or more bubbles of the same color, those bubbles pop/drop off. Bubbles that are hanging (i.e. no longer connected to the base or other bubbles) also fall off.
Some levels include diamonds or special gems placed in certain parts of the bubble structure. You need to target those, maybe by matching bubbles around them or popping surrounding bubbles to let them fall.
You win a level if all bubbles (or the required ones) are cleared. If you run out of shots (or fail to clear the required bubbles), you lose and must retry.

games.title: Connect Line
games.description:
Connect Lines is a puzzle game in which the goal is to rotate line-segments so that together they form a continuous connected path or network i.e. all the lines must join up into one single connected structure.
It is simple in appearance but grows challenging, because you must figure out the correct orientation of each piece so that the network is complete without any breaks.
As the puzzle advances, the arrangement / layout becomes more complex. The number of line-pieces increases, the shapes become more varied, and finding the correct connection scheme becomes harder. You may need to think ahead about how rotating one piece will affect connections with several adjacent pieces. (This is standard for these kinds of puzzles.)
games.howToPlayText:
Connect all lines into one unified path (or network). Every piece must be connected properly so there are no loose ends.
The board has many small line segments. These might be straight lines, curves, etc. Each segment is oriented in some way.
You can click on a line piece to rotate it. Each click usually rotates the piece by 90¬∞ (or possibly another fixed amount) to change its orientation.

games.title: Spill & Knock Down
games.description: In Spill It!, you drop balls in order to knock over glasses and spill everything inside them. It combines simple mechanics with physics-based puzzles‚Äîto achieve the goal you must carefully aim, drop, and use gravity / momentum to spill from glasses.
games.howToPlayText:
You get to drop balls from certain positions.
You can aim or choose the drop point in many cases.
The balls interact with the environment: glassware, supports, possibly moving platforms or obstacles.
Physics matters: timing, angle, force, obstacle clearance.

Your goal is to spill all the liquid from the glasses. You do this by using the balls: drop, throw or position them so that they hit the glasses (directly or via bouncing or rollovers) and cause the liquid inside to spill out.

games.title: Rotate Cups
games.description:
This is a rotation physics puzzle game where you control the angle of cups to try to get the balls to roll into specific cups.
Rotate cups clockwise or counterclockwise as needed to turn the clear cups into ramps guiding the ball down the level.
Place at least one ball in each of the blue cups.
In this game you have to get all the balls into the blue cups lower down the screen.
Larger blue cups can hold more than one ball in them.
If there are multiple smaller blue cups you must get a ball into each of them.
Levels are not timed & you can both rotate as many times as you like & pause as many times as you like.

You can skip intermediary cups. On most levels you typically want to use all the cups on the way down, but if you are struggling to do so you can bump a ball off the outside of a cup or skip a cup entirely & it won‚Äôt harm you in the least provided your balls eventually get into the blue cups.
Some levels have a long reach you have to make the ball roll. On those levels sometimes a somewhat rapid cup spin toward the destination is enough, but in some cases you have to do that rapid spin as the starting point & then slightly spin back quickly right as the ball is leaving to give the ball a bit more lift.
games.howToPlayText:
Desktop:
Use your mouse left click button to select on the screen & drag your mouse to rotate the cups.
Drag left or down to spin clockwise.
Drag right or up to spin counterclockwise.

Touchscreen devices:
Tap the screen with a finger & drag your finger across the screen to rotate cups clockwise or counterclockwise.

games.title: Screw Puzzle
games.description:
Embark on a captivating journey into the world of Wood Screw Puzzle, the ultimate wood nuts and bolts puzzle game that will challenge your mind and delight your senses. This isn't just another screw sort game; it's an immersive experience where you'll unravel intricate arrangements of wood screws, nuts and bolts, and other fascinating fasteners, proving your screw master skills along the way.

Unscrew, Unwind, and Unleash Your Inner Puzzle Master:

Each level of Wood Screw Puzzle presents a unique challenge, a mesmerizing tapestry of wood screws and nuts and bolts intertwined in a complex dance. Your task is to carefully analyze the arrangement, strategize your moves, and skillfully manipulate the screw pins and fasteners to screw out each piece and free them from their wooden embrace. It's a test of your logic, spatial reasoning, and dexterity, all wrapped up in a visually stunning and tactilely satisfying wood nuts and bolts puzzle game.
games.howToPlayText:
Solve the Wooden Puzzle: Conquer the challenge of the wooden stack, untangle bolts and nuts, and unlock the secrets hidden deep within the wood.
Master the Mechanic Puzzle: Arm yourself with a screwdriver and outsmart wood wasps, overcome the plumer crack obstacles, and avoid the whimsical squirrel nuts.
Explore the Woods: Venture into the heart of the woods game, where each level brings a new conundrum. Are you ready to delve into the mind-blowing world of Screws & Fasteners?

games.title: Number Sums
games.description:
Number Sums is a challenging number puzzle to train your mental math. The goal is to make the sum of numbers in each row, column, and colored region be equal to the clues on the side of the board and inside the colored regions. Practice your math skills and logic with Number Sums!

Each row, column, and region has its own solution, but the goal of this math game with numbers is to make them all work at the same time. You have to circle the correct numbers and erase the numbers you don't need. Remember, the sums of the numbers in rows, columns and colored regions should be equal to the numbers on the sides of the board and inside each region. Each level of this numbers game has only one solution, try to find it to solve educational math puzzles!

Mental arithmetic is an invaluable math skill for your everyday life. Inside Number Sums you'll find math puzzles of various difficulty. The mechanics of these math riddles sounds simple but requires a lot of thinking. Playing sum number games and solving math problems can improve your arithmetic skills. If you are interested in number puzzles or math games for adults, and in training your addition skills, play this engaging number game for hours of fun!
games.howToPlayText:
- Circle the correct numbers that add up to the values on the sides of the rows, columns and regions.
- Use the toggle to switch between circling and erasing modes. It will help you to mark the correct numbers and the extra numbers that you don't need.
- Each level of these math puzzles has only one possible solution, so make sure that the rows, columns and colored regions work together at the same time.
- Train your math skills with this free number puzzle with various levels of difficulty. Open different types of board from 3x3 to 10x10.

Perfect for chilling out, Color Coin Puzzle offers you a soothing way to pass your time. With lots of levels, this game is all about relaxing your mind.

If you liked playing classic sorting games like Coin Sort or Ball Sort, you'll love Color Coin Puzzle! It's not just fun but also a good brain exercise.  Dive into the colorful world and sort colorful coins to get a satisfying experience.
games.howToPlayText:
- Tap and drag to move coins. You can only move coins of the same color. 
- Only one color coin can be moved at one time.
- You can place a coin on top of another only if both are of the same color.
- Try to stack all coins of the same color together. 
- Use your color matching skills to solve these fun logic puzzles.
- Enjoy thousands of levels for endless fun!

games.description:
Stack Em Up! is a casual single-player puzzle game where your goal is to connect stacks of the same color to combine them. By chaining same-colored stacks, you build longer stacks; you try to reach stacks of length 10 or more.
It‚Äôs stylised and simple in controls.
There are many levels that get progressively more challenging.
games.howToPlayText:
Tap on a stack: You select a stack by tapping it.
Connect with other stacks of the same color: Once you select a stack, you try to link it to other stacks of the same color to form a longer chain.
Form stacks / chains of 10 or more: One of the objectives is to make long stacks (length ‚â• 10). Bigger stacks give more ‚Äúscore‚Äù / help you meet level-goals.
Watch your moves: You have limited moves or constraints per level; you must achieve the objective before you run out of moves, or before you run out of opportunity. 
Progress through levels: Levels get harder as you go, likely adding complications (more colors, tricky board layouts, etc.).

games.title: Color Roll 3D
games.description:
Experience one of the most addictive, color-filled puzzle game ‚Äî Color Roll 3D! Think you've got a keen eye for details? Ready to challenge your brain? Then this color game is just for you! It's all about color, creativity, and some serious agility!

In Color Roll 3D, you'll need to copy the exact image you're shown, down to the last detail! How? Just by unrolling and arranging the vibrantly colored rolls the puzzle game give you for each level. Sounds easy, right? But wait, there's a catch! You've got to ensure the colors overlap in just the right way to perfectly match the image.

Got the image in your head? Great! Now get to work and let those colorful rolls fly! Just tap each roll and watch as it smoothly moves across your screen, bringing the image to life. But remember, it's all about getting those colors to line up just right!
games.howToPlayText:
You are given several colored rolls. Each roll is like a ribbon or band that you can tap to start unrolling.
When you tap, the roll moves/unrolls and overlays onto the puzzle area. The goal is that the overlapping colours and their positions match the sample image you‚Äôre trying to replicate.
The challenge comes from getting the direction and position of each roll correct. If you unroll a roll the wrong way, or overlay in the wrong spot, the final image will look different from the target.

Since the game has no time limits and no way to lose, you can enjoy this stress-free experience complete with hundreds of unique levels on your computer or mobile device. You drag a block using your finger (touch screen) or with mouse (click & drag)

games.description:
Okay? is a minimalist puzzle game that turns simple shapes into clever challenges. Every level is made of blocks, lines, and objects placed on a clean, abstract screen. Your goal is simple: clear all the objects with just one perfect move.

Draw a line with your finger, release it, and watch it bounce around the screen. If your move is right, the line will hit and remove every object until the screen is empty. Sounds easy? As levels go up, the puzzles get smarter, requiring perfect angles, timing, and logic.
games.howToPlayText:
Your goal is to clear all the elements (lines, blocks, etc.) from the board.
You draw a line (with your finger / touch) starting from somewhere, and that line interacts with the elements on screen.
The drawn line will ‚Äúpop‚Äù or hit the elements, making them disappear (‚Äúclear all the elements‚Äù) if done correctly.
There are many levels, increasingly challenging.
Some puzzles are simple; others require more precise dragging, angles, and timing.

Complete each level by untangling eggs such that each line connecting eggs is not intersected by any other line connecting eggs. Warm up with some light puzzles and work your way up to an egg-tangling like you've never seen! Happy Easter!
games.howToPlayText:

Reposition to avoid intersections:
Adjust positions so that none of the connecting lines between eggs cross each other. All lines must be ‚Äúuntangled.‚Äù

Change color to green:
When the arrangement has no intersecting lines, the eggs and the lines turn green, meaning the level is solved.
